derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin perorat- 'spoken at length', from the verb perorare, from per- 'through' + orare 'speak'

means.word_mean: 1. conclude a speech with a formal recapitulation
2. deliver an oration in grandiloquent style
